item.title: If you had the power to bring someone who it will be?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“victor_ZOLO, post:35, topic:148424”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=203542.msg1813370#msg1813370 date=1191962736]

In that case, I’d probably bring back a famous scientist or something like that.

Albert Einstien?

I’d Bring back Hitler so he can be executed for his doings

Thug, that’s because he did nothing but smoke marijuana. I think it’s some “religion” in Brazil and shit, just sit around all day and smoke marijuana. Or it’s a belief, whatever it is, it still falls into the category of a religion I believe.

Brazil, the home of reggae!

(Also Einstein was not a jew)

Yes he was thats why he fled Germany during World War 2

~XDZ
[/quote][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=203542.msg1813370#msg1813370 date=1191962736]

In that case, I’d probably bring back a famous scientist or something like that.

Albert Einstien?

I’d Bring back Hitler so he can be executed for his doings

Thug, that’s because he did nothing but smoke marijuana. I think it’s some “religion” in Brazil and shit, just sit around all day and smoke marijuana. Or it’s a belief, whatever it is, it still falls into the category of a religion I believe.

Brazil, the home of reggae!

(Also Einstein was not a jew)

Yes he was thats why he fled Germany during World War 2

~XDZ
[/quote]
I agree with you swordkid Hitler should kill him Albert did not relase that theroy he merely kill the man who came up with it and take credit for his work[/quote]

I believe Swordskid61 meant bring back Hitler, then execute him.

Read full topic

item.title: If you had the power to bring someone who it will be?
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:31, topic:148424”][quote author=Fr33b1e link=topic=203542.msg1807821#msg1807821 date=1191756394]
Thug, that’s because he did nothing but smoke marijuana. I think it’s some “religion” in Brazil and shit, just sit around all day and smoke marijuana. Or it’s a belief, whatever it is, it still falls into the category of a religion I believe.
[/quote]

Brazil, the home of reggae!

(Also Einstein was not a jew)[/quote]
I beg to differ…

en.wikipedia.org

Albert Einstein

Albert Einstein (/ˈaɪnstaɪn/ EYEN-styne; German: [ˈalbɛɐ̯t ˈʔaɪnʃtaɪn] (listen); 14 March 1879 – 18 April 1955) was a German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics (alongside quantum mechanics).:274 His work is also known for its influence on the philosophy of science. He is best known to the general public for his mass–energy equivalence formula E = mc2, which has been dubbed "the world's most famous equation" Near the beg...

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

I’d bring Satan back up to Earth tbh. I could care less, either him, or Albert Einstein. Just think about this, since he was Jewish, he was a refugee from Germany. If they didn’t attempt to kill all Jews, they would be ruling over us, because they would have the Atomic Bomb.
